trans-unit.source: Represents a control that raises its <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click" /> event repeatedly from the time it is pressed until it is released.
trans-unit.target: 누른 시점부터 놓을 때까지 해당 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click" /> 이벤트를 반복해서 발생시키는 컨트롤을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, 즉, 모든 형식 (예: 문자열, 이미지 또는 패널)의 단일 개체가 포함 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> class represents a control that is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
However, repeat buttons give you control over when and how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 반복 단추 제어할 수 있습니다 시기 및 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> 이벤트가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event repeatedly from the time it is pressed until it is released.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 발생는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> 해제 될 때까지 누른 시간에서 반복 해 서 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property determines when the event begins.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> 속성 이벤트 시작 하는 시점을 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can also control the interval of the repetitions with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 반복 간격을 제어할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Customizing the RepeatButton Control
To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 여러 동일한 속성 설정을 적용 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 컨트롤을 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 기본값을 수정할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> 고유한 모양을 제어할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 만들기에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, 참조 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>, see [RepeatButton Syles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/repeatbutton-syles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 부분 및 관련 된 상태를 보려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>, 참조 [RepeatButton Syles 및 템플릿](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/repeatbutton-syles-and-templates.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을이 컨트롤은 컨트롤의 기본 스타일으로 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 속성은 응용 프로그램에이 컨트롤이 표시 하는 경우 속성이 기본값에서 변경 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 기본 스타일 응용 프로그램이 실행 중인 때 사용 되는 데스크톱 테마에 따라 결정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 시각적 속성을 설정만 영향을 미칠 속성 시각적 단추 컨트롤의 기본 서식 파일에 속성이 있으며를 사용 하 여 설정 된 경우는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: "변경의 시각적 구조의 정도 제어" 섹션의 시각적 속성 목록을 찾을 수 있습니다 [는 ControlTemplate을 만들어 기존 컨트롤의 모양 사용자 지정](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>를 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> class.
Gets or sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> waits while it is pressed before it starts repeating.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" />을 누르고 있는 동안 반복이 시작될 때까지 대기하는 시간(밀리초)을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value must be non-negative.
The amount of time, in milliseconds, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> waits while it is pressed before it starts repeating.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" />을 누르고 있는 동안 반복이 시작될 때까지 대기하는 시간(밀리초)입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardDelay" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None

The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property to set the time that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> waits before it starts repeating.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> 속성을 시간을 설정할는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 반복 되기 전까지 대기 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, between repeats once repeating starts.
trans-unit.target: 반복이 시작된 후 반복 간의 시간 간격(밀리초)을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value must be non-negative.
The amount of time, in milliseconds, between repeats after repeating starts.
trans-unit.target: 반복이 시작된 후 반복 간의 시간 간격(밀리초)입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardSpeed" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None

The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval%2A> property to set the time between repeats after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> starts repeating.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval%2A> 후 반복 사이의 시간을 설정 하려면 속성에서 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 반복 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval" /> dependency property.
Raises an automation event and calls the base method to raise the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 자동화 이벤트를 발생시키고 기본 메서드를 호출하여 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click" /> 이벤트를 발생시킵니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RepeatButtonAutomationPeer" /> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 인프라의 일부로 이 컨트롤에 대한 적절한 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RepeatButtonAutomationPeer" /> 구현을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation.
The event data for a <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> event.
Responds to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> event.
The event data for a <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp" /> event.
Responds to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp" /> event.
The event data for a <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture" /> event.
Called when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> loses mouse capture.
The event data for a <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter" /> event.
Reports when the mouse enters an element.
The event data for a <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave" /> event.
Reports when the mouse leaves an element.
The event data for a <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> event.
Responds to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> event.
The event data for a <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp" /> event.
Responds to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp" /> event.
